output.sentences: There was an abandoned building that was completely exploded
In the building there was an odd looking chair surrounded by blocks that appeared to be a throne.
On the wall there was a sign that read, " eyes cannot be replaced". Sadly, this statement is true, regarding the building.
The space in the building makes me feel really strange and odd.
